name: Online Marketing AG
description:
Online Marketing AG is a leading online marketing & PR agency. The company specializes in sustainable online marketing campaigns. Online Marketing AG was founded in Zug in 2010. She is an official Google Partner.

Our Approach: Starting with a website audit or an online marketing consultation, we define the objectives together with the customer and work out the strategic plan. After this, we determine the measures: search engine optimization (SEO), search engine advertising (SEA), online PR, newsletter/email marketing and social media marketing.
